favourite.article: William Edensor Littlewood was born in London and graduated from Cambridge. He was a vicar in St. James, Bath, England. He published this hymn in his book, "A Garland from the Parables" in 1857. He wrote books on the Bible and Christian life as well as secular books on history and geography of England: "The Essentials of English History", "Essentials of New Testament Study", "Bible Biographies", "An Elementary History of Britain", "England at Home, a Description of the Principal Features of England and Wales", "The Visitation of the Poor: A Manual". --------------- The last line of the hymn originally says, "In the dear heavenly home."
